title: Spectre 1.9.6 – 20-tool real-time audio analyzer
content: Spectre is the leading multi-instrument, real-time audio analyzer for OS X, packed with 20 different multi-channel and multi-trace meters including Level, VU, Spectrograph, Oscilloscope and Spectrogram.   Spectre makes metering as beautiful as it is useful. Design, speed, accuracy, and dependability are all central to Spectre’s design, placing it among the most powerful real-time analyzers […]

title: AKVIS Enhancer 16.0 – Standalone app and Photoshop plug-in reveal image detail info
content: AKVIS Enhancer is image enhancement software that improves detail on an image, no matter what was the cause of the unsharpness. It works in three modes: Improve Detail, Prepress, and Tone Correction. The main goal for these modes is the same – correction, but the methods and the results are quite different. Different photos require […]

title: DAEMON Tools 6.3.419 – Create and mount disc images
content: DAEMON Tools is a solution for mounting and creating CD/DVD/HDD disc images.   Access Options: Mount images in the following supported formats: *.b5t, *.b6t, *.bwt, *.ccd, *.cdi, *.bin/*.cue, *.ape/*.cue, *.flac/*.cue, *.iso, *.isz, *.mds/*.mdf, *.mdx, *.nrg, *.pdi, *.dmg, *.vhd. title: SpotFiles 3.0.19 – Find files without Spotlight
content: SpotFiles is an advanced tool for files searching.   Does not use Spotlight engine. Saved Searches. File Attributes Viewer. Directory Snapshot and Comparison.   Version 3.0.19: Contact information Minor corrections   Intel, 64-bit processor OS X 10.9 or later

title: popCalendar 1.8.7 – Calendar for the menu bar
